name: Buttons to Edit Next/Previous Post
author: Aftab Muni

sections.description: This plugin will add easy shortcut buttons to edit next and previous post in admin edit-post page. You can directly navigate to next and previous post.
sections.installation:
To install this plugin follow below steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. That’s it, no other settings needed.
sections.faq:
When this plugin is useful?

This plugin is useful when you need to add buttons to easily navigate to next or previous post from edit_post page.

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

Is this plugin supported for old WordPress?

Yes it is supported for older as well as newer versions of WordPress.

Is this plugin multisite supported?

Yes.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Fix: Added fix for WP 5.5 release.

1.1

  • New: Added navigation support for Pages post type as well.

1.0

  • First public release.
